director.name: Yfke Van Berckelaer Yfke Van Berckelaer

introduction: Have you ever tried to work at the office only to be distracted by chatty coworkers, or watched a movie in the theater interrupted by people making phone calls or talking, or sat in a cafe where loud patrons act as if they own the place? Have you ever felt the urge to do something drastic about these selfish individuals who are oblivious to those around them? If so, this short will provide you with a perfect sense of vicarious satisfaction.
